The color accuracy and style receive positive reviews. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic dress
items.body: I love this dress. True to size. Itâ€™s flowy, comfortable & so pretty in person. Read more
items.author: Courtney C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WELL WORTH IT! EXTREMELY HAPPY!!
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS DRESS! I AM 5'10 AND 220 LBS, I BOUGHT A 3X AND IT FIT PERFECTLY! I WORE FOR A WEDDING AND I GOT COMPLIMENTS ALL NIGHT! THIS DRESS IS VERY ELEGANT! VERY FLOWEY, AND MOST OF ALL COMFORTABLE. I CANNOT BE HAPPIER WITH THIS PURCHASE! XOXO Read more
items.author: Shara P.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good, not bad, but not worth it
items.body: The color wasn't as pictured. It ended up looking more violet. The frills at the end were ugly, the fit is okay, more on the bigger side. I didn't like it in the end, I returned it. Read more
items.author: Aaron D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Polyester must iron
items.body: Polyester. You will have to iron it. I am concerned about how much static it will have when I wear my dress coat. I also had to adjust the snap at the cleavage as it was lop-sided. Otherwise pretty. Read more
items.author: shadacamp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like the photo
items.body: I'm very happy with this dress! I ordered it at the last minute for a wedding. It is a nice, comfortable material and the wrinkling from packaging and shipping was minimal. It looks exactly like the photo, and my suggested size fits perfectly. The top is a little loose but I will use some fabric tape to keep it in place. Read more
items.author: Cynthia E

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lake Blue, Rust, White, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
